properties.name: Zan's Minimap
properties.description: Zanâ€™s Minimap (also known as VoxelMap) adds a fully functional minimap on the right corner of your screen.

properties.name: Inventory Tweaks
properties.description: This mod allows you to easily manage your inventory. It works out of the box, and will make you gain a massive amount of time!

properties.name: Shaders
properties.description: Improves the graphics. Only works on highend graphic adapters.

properties.name: Optifine
properties.description: Allows Minecraft to run faster and look better with full support for HD textures and many configuration options.

properties.name: Soartex
properties.description: Soartex Fanver, a fan continuation of Soar49's Soartex, brings smooth and clean textures to Minecraft.
